about_the_game:
About This Game

Set in the harsh desert of western North America in 1933, amidst a world of alcohol-fueled, ruthless bounty hunters, there exists a more peculiar kind of hunter—the Grotesque Hunter. Step into the game and encounter the most mysterious Grotesque Hunter, becoming their partner as you unravel the secrets of this world and your own.

Grotesque Insight is a narrative-driven point-and-click puzzle game that emphasizes immersive storytelling. As a player, you will navigate through the fog of the storyline, where everything is connected to you.

Surviving on the desolate land of faded hues, rough textures, aridity, and rolling tumbleweeds, the Grotesque Hunter confronts incomprehensible entities outside the sight of common people. In the eyes of those who understand the grotesque, supernatural beings and individuals are just as audacious as the rampant disease markings on their minds and skin. Uncontainable desires roll like putrid dead lakes, vibrant and tumultuous. Whether driven by justice or rewards, hunters perceive the grotesque as their only prey—a priceless quarry worth risking their lives for. Armed with intellect, attentiveness, and determination, they eliminate these unfamiliar and formidable aberrations.

But as Carter, the most skilled observer among the Grotesque Hunters, today he encounters the most extraordinary grotesque—an enigmatic child whose deadliness stems not from being abnormal, but from being human...

Game Features

Players will experience an exceptional supernatural storyline combined with classic Western elements.
The game features a unique art style.
Immersive music sets the mood throughout the gameplay.
Simple controls, yet challenging logical and deductive puzzles.
Moral choices that delve into human nature, showcasing both possibilities for salvation and helplessness.The Answer is in game.
